name: Catbusters
description:
Catbusters is an action-packed multiplayer wave shooter for Steam VR.

You must defend against Count Scratchula and his evil undead minions. You are a mighty Catbusters armed with high-tech weapons to battle the hoards of vampire cats. Can you survive the fury of the furball attacks?

Features


  • Cooperative multiplayer action
  • Exciting weapon bonuses
  • Big boss challenges
  • Selectable difficulty levels
